content.question: Which of the following most directly contributed to the overall trend in the percentages of industrial production and heavy industry as shown in the table for the period 1890–1938 ?

choices.label: Japan’s defeat of Russia in the Russo-Japanese War
Japan’s entry into the World Trade Organization

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
